sentences.en: A bitterly cold winter damaged industrial output and trade.
sentences.cn: 严寒的冬天损害了工业生产和贸易.

sentences.en: He complained bitterly about his exam grades.
sentences.cn: 他悲叹自己的考试成绩不好。

sentences.en: He realized how he had been fooled, and laughed bitterly.
sentences.cn: 他明白了自己是怎么被愚弄的, 苦笑起来.

sentences.en: He spoke most bitterly of his experiences in prison.
sentences.cn: 他非常痛苦地讲述了他在监狱中的经历.

sentences.en: His sons quarrelled bitterly over the allocation of family resources.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子们为家产如何分配而吵得很凶。

sentences.en: It was bitterly cold now and the ground was frozen hard.
sentences.cn: 现在天气冷极了，地面都冻硬了。

sentences.en: Regional monopolies were bitterly fought for.
sentences.cn: 为夺取地方垄断权发生了激烈的竞争.

sentences.en: She remained bitterly opposed to the idea of moving abroad.
sentences.cn: 她仍然强烈反对移居国外。

sentences.en: Some of them bitterly attacked their former friends.
sentences.cn: 他们中有些人恶毒地攻击他们过去的朋友.

sentences.en: Tamara would sally out on bitterly cold nights.
sentences.cn: 塔玛拉会不畏严寒在夜晚外出。

sentences.en: The march was bitterly opposed by local residents.
sentences.cn: 这次游行遭到了当地居民的愤怒抵制。

sentences.en: The two brothers set to and fought bitterly.
sentences.cn: 兄弟俩打起来了,而且打得难解难分.

sentences.en: They were bitterly disappointed at the result of the game.
sentences.cn: 他们对比赛结果极为失望。

sentences.en: They will bitterly regret what they have done for ever more.
sentences.cn: 他们会为自己的所作所为痛悔终生。

sentences.en: Though Sybbis complained bitterly, Mama would not let up on her.
sentences.cn: 尽管西比斯大发牢骚，但妈妈不会放她一马。

words.tran_cn: 苦的；痛苦的；尖刻的；充满仇恨的
苦涩地，悲痛的；残酷地；怨恨地

trans.tran_cn: 伤心地，愤怒地，极其，非常
trans.tran_en: in a way that produces or shows feelings of great sadness or anger
